Réponse: sqldf("SELECT species, island, bill_length_mm FROM penguins LIMIT 5")
sqldf("SELECT * FROM penguins WHERE sex = 'Male' AND flipper_length_mm > 210")
sqldf("SELECT species, MAX(bill_length_mm) AS max_bill FROM penguins GROUP BY species")
sqldf("SELECT bill_length_mm / bill_depth_mm AS ratio FROM penguins ORDER BY ratio DESC LIMIT 5")
sqldf("SELECT island, AVG(flipper_length_mm) AS avg_flipper FROM penguins GROUP BY island")

Exercice: Exercice 8 — Comptage par espèce et sexe
Réponse: sqldf("SELECT species, sex, COUNT(*) AS n FROM penguins WHERE sex IS NOT NULL GROUP BY species, sex ORDER BY species, sex")
sqldf("SELECT * FROM penguins WHERE bill_length_mm BETWEEN 40 AND 50")
sqldf("SELECT * FROM penguins ORDER BY bill_length_mm DESC LIMIT 10")
